column5: I read about this in the newspaper today.  Article and photo  It is not as big as this fish:

Those are pretty huge, but this one's bigger: http://www.bcfishtours.ca/-Whale5.jpg  It is the largest caught as part of the tagging program in 2007 by Wade Gienow (though there are claims of bigger beening caught, but not tagged).  Here's a more recent article too, though they have the largest caught as the one in 2003 (using older records).   http://www.canada.com/theprovince/news/sto...29-34118b9a813a
Wonder how the fight is with 15' long floar rod + centerpin ... haha
